short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and save supplier information from the web to your Account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficiently streamline your supplier sourcing process with AnaSync Navigator, seamlessly integrating supplier data directly into your workflow. Easily collect and manage supplier information while browsing the web.

With AnaSync Navigator, you can:

★ Drastically reduce sourcing time
Automatically aggregate supplier data from websites, empowering you to evaluate suppliers and make informed decisions swiftly.

★ Keep your supplier pipeline organized
Assign potential suppliers to database, initiate procurement opportunities, and update supplier statuses in real-time as you gain new insights.

★ Collaborate effortlessly with your team
Your annotations, supplier updates, and procurement progress are instantly shared with your team through AnaApp, facilitating smooth collaboration and decision-making.

AnaSync Navigator is a Chrome extension of AnaApp built for busy procurement professionals to automatically collect supplier data.

Here's how AnaApp is different than any Procurement tool you've seen before:

★ Collects supplier data based on user search and intent
★ Drives compliance through process transparency
★ Engages with user through their preferred communication channels
★ Allows suppliers to engage naturally via email then turns emails into insights..

.. so that you'll never have to manually input data and email responses in your S2C or SRM again.
